general.commands_available:
שלום! השם שלי הוא Alita.
אני כאן בשביל לעזור לכם בניהול קבוצות!
הפקודות שלי הם:
 - /start: מתחיל את הבוט
 - /help: מה אני יכולה לעשות.
 - /donate: פרטים על איך לתרום!

כל הפקודות יכולות להיות בשימוש / או !.
admin.useadmincache: תשלחו את הפקודה /admincache בשביל לרענן את רשימת המנהלים בבוט!
admin.reloadedadmins: שמרתי את כל המנהלים בקבוצה זאת!
admin.nopromoteperm: You don't have permission to promote members!
admin.nodemoteperm: You don't have permission to demote members!
admin.nopinmsg: Reply to a message to which you want to pin...
rules.clear: Successfully cleared rules for this group!
rules.set_rules: Successfully set rules for this group.
rules.no_rules: The Admins for this group have not setup rules!
rules.pm_me: First PM me and then get the rules!
lang.changelang: Here you can change language used for the bot.
start.private: Hello! I'm Alita_Robot. To discover more about my functions, click on the buttons below.
translate.translate_usage: Usage: /tr text for translation (Can be also used in reply to a message).
locks.invalid_lock:
Invalid Lock Type!

Use /locktypes to get the lock types
locks.view_perm: CHAT PERMISSIONS: Send Messages: {vmsg} Send Media: {vmedia} Send Stickers: {vstickers} Send Animations: {vanimations} Can Play Games: {vgames} Can Use Inline Bots: {vinlinebots} Webpage Preview: {vwebprev} Send Polls: {vpolls} Change Info: {vinfo} Invite Users: {vinvite} Pin Messages: {vpin}
purge.old_msg_err: Cannot delete all messages. The messages may be too old, I might not have delete rights, or this might not be a supergroup.
purge.err_basic: Cannot purge messages in a basic group
blacklist.no_blacklist: There are no blacklisted messages in {chat_title}!
